item.title: [Delta] Full Pickpocketing [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Okay only a few things need to be done i didn’t really feel like adding so much rewards so its just cash from every npc and it’s just a 50/50 chance.

Other than that Make a new class named pickpocket

[code]package server.Player.skills.thieving;

import server.client;
import server.Player.Events.*;
import server.misc.misc;
import server.server;

public class pickpocket extends pickpocketData {

public static void start(client c, int NPC, int NPCSlot) {
	for (people p : people.values()) {
	if(NPC == p.getId() && c.playerLevel[17] <= p.getLevel()) {
		c.sM("You need a thieving level of "+p.getLevel()+" to thieve a "+c.GetNpcName(NPC)+"");
		return;
	}
	if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastThieve < 2000) {
		return;
	}
	if(c.absX == server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX && c.absY == server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY) {
		c.fmwalkto(0, -1);
		c.TurnPlayerTo(server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX, server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY);			
	}

switch(misc.random(1)) {
case 0:
pickpocket(c, NPC);
lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
break;
case 1:
fail(c, NPC, NPCSlot);
lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
break;
}
}
}

public static void pickpocket(client c, int NPC) {
	for (people p : people.values()) {
	if(NPC == p.getId() && c.playerLevel[17] >= p.getLevel()) {
		c.startAnimation(881);
		c.sM("You pickpocket the "+c.GetNpcName(NPC)+".");
		c.addItem(995, 3 + misc.random(p.getCash()));
		c.addSkillXP(p.getExp(), 17);
	}
}
}

public static void fail(final client player, int NPC, final int NPCSlot) {
	for (final people p : people.values()) {
	if(NPC == p.getId() && player.playerLevel[17] >= p.getLevel()) {
	player.walkDelay = 2000;
	player.lastWalk = System.currentTimeMillis();
	server.npcHandler.failText(NPCSlot, ""+player.playerName+" is stealing!");
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].TurnNpcTo(player.absX, player.absY);

	EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
		        public void execute(EventContainer c) {
		    		server.npcHandler.failAnim(NPCSlot, p.getAnim());
		    		player.stillgfx(348, player.absY, player.absX, player.heightLevel+100, 0);
		    		player.dealDamage(2);
	                player.hitDiff = 2;
		    		player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	                player.hitUpdateRequired = true;
		        	c.stop();
		        
    }
}, 100); // executes every 60,000 ms = 60 seconds

};
}
}

}[/code]

Also make a new class pickpocketingdata and put this inside

package server.Player.skills.thieving;

[code]public class pickpocketData {

protected static long lastThieve;

private static int PUNCH = 422, SWORD = 451;


public static enum people {		
	MAN(1, 1, 10, 5, PUNCH),
	GUARD(9, 40, 100, 15, SWORD),
	GUARD2(10, 40, 100, 15, SWORD);
	
	private int id, level, exp, cash, anim;
	
	private people(int id, int level, int exp, int cash, int anim) {
		this.id = id;
		this.level = level;
		this.exp = exp;
		this.cash = cash;
		this.anim = anim;
	}
	
	public int getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public int getLevel() {
		return level;
	}
	
	public int getExp() {
		return exp;
	}
	public int getCash() {
		return cash;
	}
	public int getAnim() {
		return anim;
	}
	
	
}

}[/code]

Now go to your client.java

search for case 17:

inside of that packet

put this:

pickpocket.start(this, NPCID, NPCSlot); }

Read full topic
